statements: SELECT * FROM patients_genetic_data;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_sequence FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM patients_genetic_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients_genetic_data;
SELECT * FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Alzheimer';
SELECT patient_id, genetic_sequence FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Parkinson' AND patient_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients_genetic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Heart Disease' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, ethnicity FROM Patients WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, g.genetic_info FROM Patients p INNER JOIN GeneticData g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patients
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE frequency='Daily'
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id JOIN medications ON treatments.medication_id = medications.medication_id
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_dob FROM patients_data;
SELECT * FROM genetic_info WHERE genetic_id = 1;
SELECT research_date, researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT therapy_type, therapy_duration, prescription_date FROM therapy_data WHERE genetic_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_dob FROM patients_data WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM patients_data;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_dob FROM patients_data ORDER BY patient_gender, patient_name;
SELECT r.research_id, r.research_date, r.researcher_name, g.gene_affected FROM research_data r JOIN genetic_info g ON r.genetic_id = g.genetic_id;
SELECT t.therapy_id, t.therapy_type, t.therapy_duration, p.patient_name FROM therapy_data t JOIN patients_data p ON t.genetic_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_sequence, age, gender FROM PatientGeneticData;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan, patient_id FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, type, variant_id FROM GeneticVariants WHERE impact='High';
SELECT trial_name, end_date, start_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT conclusion, publication_date, result_id FROM ResearchResults ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_sequence, age, gender FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='Cancer' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, type, impact FROM GeneticVariants ORDER BY impact ASC, gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT result_id, publication_date, conclusion FROM ResearchResults WHERE conclusion LIKE '%positive%'
